revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Meteor Falls |image = [[File:Meteor Falls.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Meteor Falls. |tokens = 18,000 |location = North of Route 115. }} '''Meteor Falls''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 443,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || rowspan=5|[[File:Old_Couple.png|40px]] Old Couple John and Jay || rowspan=5|[[File:Medicham.png|40px]] Medicham, [[File:Hariyama.png|40px]] Hariyama |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Goldeen.png|40px]] Goldeen |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp |- | [[File:Barboach.png|40px]] Barboach |- |}
<!--T:5--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Solrock.png|40px]] Solrock || <center> rowspan=2|1,240,000 || rowspan=2|[[File:Dragon_Tamer.png|40px]] Dragon Tamer Nicolas || rowspan=2|[[File:Altaria.png|40px]] Altaria, [[File:Altaria.png|40px]] Altaria || rowspan=2|<center> 640,000 |- | [[File:Lunatone.png|40px]] Lunatone |}
==Items== <!--T:6-->
<tabs> <!--T:7--> <tab name="No Debuff">
<!--T:8--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense}} || 6 || 41.30% || 39.91% || 34.09% |- | {{Bag2|Pokéball}} || 4 || 27.54% || 26.60% || 22.72% |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || N/A || 6.88% || 6.65% || 5.68% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 10.11% || 10.66% || 12.99% |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 10.11% || 10.66% || 12.99% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Stone Plate}} || N/A || 1.01% || 1.32% || 2.60% |- | {{Bag2|Iron Plate}} || N/A || 1.01% || 1.32% || 2.60% |- | {{Bag2|Sky Plate}} || N/A || 1.01% || 1.32% || 2.60% |- | {{Bag2|Draco Plate}} || N/A || 1.01% || 1.32% || 2.60% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Star Piece}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.22% || 1.10% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:9-->
<!--T:10--> After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:11--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
